showerReviews.reviewText: … Center a few times alone with my 3.5 year old daughter. The facility is always clean with large men's/women's locker rooms and shower areas as well as (2?) Small family bathrooms/changing rooms with a locking door that offer privacy …

… to the men’s with naked guys walking around. How is that an acceptable solution? They do have 2 neutral bathrooms (1 out of service) and 1 functional for the entire pool, which is not enough. The bathroom does not have lockers or a shower. …
